mapper.select: SELECT E.ENTP_UNQ , E.ENTP_TP , E.ENTP_NM , E.SVC_TP , E.GNR_MEMO , E.STT_MONTH_CNT , E.STT_DAY_CNT , E.REG_DTM FROM STT_ENTP_LST E WHERE 1=1 AND E.ENTP_UNQ = #{entp_unq}
SELECT * FROM STT_CUST_LST WHERE 1=1 AND ENTP_UNQ = #{entp_unq}
SELECT * FROM STT_ENTP_SVR_LST WHERE 1=1 AND ENTP_UNQ = #{entp_unq}
SELECT * FROM TBL_ENTP_ATCH_LST WHERE 1=1 AND ENTP_UNQ = #{entp_unq} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STT_ENTP_LST( ENTP_TP, ENTP_NM, SVC_TP, STT_MONTH_CNT, STT_DAY_CNT, GNR_MEMO, REG_USR_ID, REG_DTM, CHG_USR_ID, CHG_DTM, DEL_YN ) VALUES( #{entp_tp}, #{entp_nm}, #{svc_tp}, #{stt_month_cnt}, #{stt_day_cnt}, #{gnr_memo}, #{reg_usr_id}, now(), #{chg_usr_id}, now(), 'N' )

INSERT INTO STT_CUST_LST( ENTP_UNQ, ENTP_TP, MEMB_DEPT_NM, MEMB_NM, MEMB_PST_NM, MEMB_TEL, MEMB_EMAIL, REG_USR_ID, REG_DTM, CHG_USR_ID, CHG_DTM, PRINCIPAL_TP ) VALUES( #{entp_unq}, #{entp_tp}, #{memb_dept_nm}, #{memb_nm}, #{memb_pst_nm}, #{memb_tel}, #{memb_email}, #{reg_usr_id}, now(), #{chg_usr_id}, null, #{principal_tp} )

INSERT INTO TBL_ENTP_ATCH_LST( ENTP_UNQ, ATCH_FILE_NM, ATCH_FILE_ORG_NM, ATCH_FILE_PATH, ATCH_FILE_SIZE, GNR_MEMO, REG_USR_ID, REG_DTM, CHG_USR_ID, CHG_DTM, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{entp_unq}, #{atch_file_nm}, #{atch_file_org_nm}, #{atch_file_path}, #{atch_file_size}, #{gnr_memo}, #{reg_usr_id}, now(), #{chg_usr_id}, now(), 'N' )

INSERT INTO STT_ENTP_SVR_LST( ENTP_UNQ, SVR_HST, SVR_IP, SVR_CONT, USE_FLAG, RESC_USE_FLAG, TRN_USE_FLAG, OS_VERS, KERN_VERS, CPU_CNT, TOTAL_MEM_SZ, USED_MEM_SZ, GPU_MODEL, TOTAL_DISK_SZ, USED_DISK_SZ, BASE_PATH, LOG_PATH, GNR_MEMO, REG_USR_ID, REG_DTM ) VALUE( #{entp_unq}, #{svr_hst}, #{svr_ip}, #{svr_cont}, #{use_flag}, #{resc_use_flag}, #{trn_use_flag}, #{os_vers}, #{kern_vers}, #{cpu_cnt}, #{total_mem_sz}, #{used_mem_sz}, #{gpu_model}, #{total_disk_sz}, #{used_disk_sz}, #{base_path}, #{log_path}, #{gnr_memo}, null, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ENTP_ATCH_LST SET DEL_YN = "Y" ,CHG_USR_ID = #{chg_usr_id} ,CHG_DTM = now() WHERE ATCH_FILE_UNQ = #{atch_file_unq}
